action.action-desc: Mr. McHenry introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To repeal the authority of the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection to restrict mandatory pre-dispute arbitration.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bureau Arbitration Fairness Act.

section.header: Repeal of authority to restrict mandatory pre-dispute arbitration
section.text: Section 1028 of the Consumer Financial Protection Act of 2010 (12 U.S.C. 5518) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking (a) Study and report.—; and
